cards.rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Create a token that’s a copy of another target creature you control, except it’s a 1/1.

If you haven’t cast a spell named Enter the Era of Stars this game, for the rest of the game, spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. [i](They cost {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)[/i]
Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Enter the Era of Stars.

Flying
Whenever an opponent draws a card, create two Junk tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a shadow counter on up to one target creature. [i](A creature with shadow can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)[/i]
Whenever a creature with shadow dies, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Flying, haste
Whenever Wreckage Ravager attacks or becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, create a Junk token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

cards.special_text:
[+2]: You get an emblem with “If a red or colorless source you control would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.”
[0]: Sigrid deals 3 damage to any target.
[-3]: Choose up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card in your graveyard. An opponent chooses one of them. Return that card to your hand, then you may cast the other without paying its mana cost. If a card cast this way would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

cards.rules_text:
Deathtouch
Opponents can’t target Skinshifting Puma with the first spell they cast each turn.
Provision: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Skinshifting Puma this turn. [i](To provision, pay {3} or sacrifice a nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.)[/i]

Vigilance
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.
[i]Frontier[/i] — As long as there are four or more land types among lands you control and Roaming Cactegu isn’t on the battlefield, it’s a Desert Forest land in addition to its other types.

Sacrifice any number of creatures. For each creature sacrificed this way, search your library for a creature card with mana value less than or equal to 2 plus the sacrificed creature’s mana value and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.

cards.special_text:
As Xylo enters, exile from your hand and/or graveyard a white or blue card with mana value 1, a white or blue card with mana value 2 or 3, and a white or blue card with mana value 5 or greater.
[+1]: You may cast a copy of a card exiled with Xylo with mana value 1 without paying its mana cost.
[-2]: You may cast a copy of a card exiled with Xylo with mana value 2 or 3 without paying its mana cost.
[-6]: You may cast a copy of a card exiled with Xylo with mana value 5 or greater without paying its mana cost.

Artifacts you control have “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only as a sorcery.”
[+1]: Mill two cards, then you may return a nonland permanent card with mana value 2
or less from your graveyard to your hand.
[-2]: Eli deals 3 damage to any target that was dealt damage this turn and you gain 3 life.

cards.rules_text: Exile up to one target nonland permanent.
cards.rules_text2: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value other than 5, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Create three Treasure tokens.

cards.rules_text:
All spells have “As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a nonlegendary permanent.”
{3}{B}{B}{R}{R}, Sacrifice The Blood Meridian: Each player’s life total becomes 1.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Create a Junk token.
[-3]: You may provision. When you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value 4 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. [i](To provision, pay {3} or sacrifice a nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.)[/i]
[-6]: You get an emblem with “Whenever you sacrifice a nonland permanent, each other player sacrifices a nonland permanent.”

cards.rules_text:
Flash
Menace, trample
When Stalker of the Bogs enters, target opponent reveals their hand. Choose a nonland card with mana value 3 or less from it. That player exiles the chosen card, then draws a card. Until end of turn, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost and as though it has flash.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, arm target creature you control. If it’s equipped twice, it gains indestructible until end of turn. [i](Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {2} attached to it.)[/i]
Whenever Amelia attacks, she deals damage to any target equal to the number of Equipments attached to attacking creatures you control. You gain that much life.

Triple strike [i](This creature deals first-strike, regular, and last-strike combat damage.)[/i]
Deadeye — {3}: Untap up to three target creatures you control. After this combat phase, there is an additional combat phase. [i](The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped.)[/i]

When The Starholme Frontier enters, if you cast it, shuffle your hand and graveyard into your library, then create seven Junk tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
[i]Frontier[/i] — Once each turn, if there are four or more land types among lands you control, you may cast a creature spell without paying its mana cost.

{T}, Pay 2 life: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one into your hand and exile the other. Then if you have exactly 14 life and you both own and control The Apocalypse Dial and an artifact named The Apocalypse Pendulum, exile them, then meld them into Azumoth, the Apocalypse.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Create a colorless Bullet artifact token with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals 1 damage to any target.”
[0]: Until end of turn, target noncreature artifact you control becomes a 4/4 artifact creature. The next time you would activate an ability of that artifact this turn, if it’s tapped, you may pay {0} rather than pay that ability’s costs.
[-6]: Exile each permanent that’s one or more colors.

cards.rules_text:
Flying, lifelink
Whenever an ability of a permanent an opponent controls triggers for the first time each turn, draw a card unless that player pays {1}.

When Opportune Musketeer enters, search your library for an Equipment card with mana value 3 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Deadeye — {W}: Each player draws a card. [i](The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped.)[/i]

Vigilance
When Annie enters, create Scooter, a legendary 2/1 white Dog creature token with “This creature has indestructible during your turn as long as you control a Human.”
Whenever Annie and at least three other creatures attack, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, provision. [i](To provision, pay {3} or sacrifice a nonland permanent with mana value 1 or less.)[/i]
Look at the top ten cards of your library. For each mana value 1, 2, and 3, you may put a creature card with that mana value from among the revealed cards onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

When Sunset Over Pike’s Chapel enters, you gain 5 life.
Each player who cast a spell this turn can’t attack, and each player who attacked this turn can’t cast spells.
Until your next turn, target permanent you control gains protection from everything. [i](It can’t be targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything.)[/i]
cards.rules_text2: Until your next turn, you can’t lose life, you can’t lose the game, and your opponents can’t win the game.

cards.rules_text:
Flash
When Jack enters, exile target spell until Jack leaves the battlefield.
Deadeye — {4}{U}{U}: You may cast a card exiled with Jack without paying its mana cost. [i](The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped.)[/i]

Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may return another creature you control to its owner’s hand. If that spell has mana value 5 or greater, create a token that’s a copy of that creature.

When Aione enters, create a 3/3 colorless Vehicle artifact token with flying and crew 2. [i](It has “Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.”)[/i]
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, draw a card, then discard a card.

Creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
If a creature would enter under your control and you cast it, instead it enters as a noncreature artifact with “{2}: This artifact becomes a creature and loses this ability.”

Flying
This spell can’t be countered.
At the beginning of your end step, untap up to four lands with different land types.
[i]Frontier[/i] — Whenever Canyon Maraterra attacks, if there are four or more land types among lands you control, draw cards until you have four cards in your hand.
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put two into your hand and the rest on the bottom in any order.
cards.rules_text2: Create a 0/0 blue Elemental creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.”

cards.rules_text:
When Nox enters, if you cast him from your hand, arm him. [i](Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with “Equipped creature gets +1/+0” and equip {2} attached to it.)[/i]
Equipments stay attached to Nox as he moves to any zone other than a player’s hand or library.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice an Equipment attached to Nox: Return him from your graveyard to the battlefield. He can’t block this turn.

Menace, deathtouch
Deadeye — {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw two cards and you lose 2 life. [i](The first time this deals combat damage to a player each turn, you may activate this ability. It costs {0} if this is equipped.)[/i]

Ward—Discard a card.
Whenever Debt Collectors attacks, destroy target creature defending player controls unless they have you create two tapped Treasure tokens.
{10}: Each opponent loses 10 life and you gain 10 life.

When The Gallows at Whiskey Bend enters, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, create a Junk token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a 3/3 red Panda Mercenary creature in addition to its other colors and types.
Destroy all nonlegendary creatures.
cards.rules_text2: Put up to one target legendary creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

Prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]

[i]Frontier[/i] — Whenever Skyfissure Dragon attacks, if there are four or more land types among lands you control, create a token that’s a copy of target attacking creature you control, except it’s a 3/3 Dragon with flying in addition to its other types. Exile that token at end of combat.

At the beginning of your upkeep, create a Junk token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]

It gains haste. Exile it at end of combat.
